name: CS-736
tagline: Assignment Solutions for CS736 Medical Image Processing.
body:
# CS-736 Assignments.

### Assignment 1

* [X-Ray Computed Tomography : Radon Transform.](assig-1/1/report/myMainScript.html)
* [X-Ray Computed Tomography : Filtered Backprojection](assig-1/2/report/myMainScript.html)
* [X-Ray Computed Tomography : Incomplete Data](assig-1/3/report/myMainScript.html)

### Assignment 2

* [Diffusion Tensor Magnetic Resonance Imaging](assig-2/1/report/report.pdf)
* [Denoising a Phantom Magnetic Resonance Image using MAP algorithm with MRF based priors](assig-2/2/report/report.pdf)
* [Denoising a Magnetic Resonance Image of the Brain using MAP algorithm with MRF based priors](assig-2/3/report/report.pdf)

### Assignment 3

* [Reconstructing a Phantom Magnetic Resonance Image using MAP Bayesian model and dynamic stepped optimization](assig-3/1/report/mainScript.html)
* [Reconstructing a Magnetic Resonance Image of the Brain using multiple Markov Random fields in f-domain](assig-3/2/report/mainScript.html)

### Assignment 4

* [Segmenting a Brain Magnetic Resonance (MR) Image using modified fuzzy-c-means (FCM)](assig-4/1/report/html/mainScript.html)
* [Segmenting a Brain Magnetic Resonance (MR) Image using EM (expectation maximization) with GMM for intensity and MRF model for labels](assig-4/2/report/report.pdf)

## Authors and Contributors

* @meetshah1995
* @BijoySingh
